title: D.A.M.A
text:
D.A.M.A (Portuguese pronunciation: [ˈdɐ.mɐ]), stylized as D.Δ.M.A or DAMA, acronym of Deixa-me Aclarar-te a Mente Amigo (English: "Let me Clear your Mind Friend"), is a Portuguese pop band from Lisbon.
